DOC.brief_title: Treatment Severe Fear Childbirth With CBT , Comparison ICBT With Traditional Live Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: In Sweden , every year , 6000 pregnant woman suffer severe FOC consequence woman 's psychological health , birth , way manage childbirth , postpartum mother-child interaction . In project want examine effect CBT SFOC give two different way . We compare result group receive support give traditionally clinic . But also group without S-FOC . In case significant effect CBT , comparable give live well ICBT , develop adequate way treatment could implement ordinary health care . Hypothesis : S-FOC decrease extent ( 30 unit W-DEQ ) treatment group . The group S-FOC , get treatment usual consuming healthcare group receive therapy . One hundred twenty pregnant woman severe fear childbirth ( S-FOC ) accord sum score Wijma Expectancy/Experience Questionnaire ( W-DEQ vers . A ) â‰¥85 , 40 woman without S-FOC ( W-DEQ < 85 ) recruit 7 participate clinic Sweden . In first baseline measure phase 40 woman S-FOC 40 woman without S-FOC follow control group , receive , necessary , treatment accord local routine . In intervention part study 80 woman S-FOC randomize either ICBT live CBT . 1 . ICBT effective traditional live therapy . 2 . ICBT efficient traditional live therapy 3 . The effect remain childbirth The successful therapy lead - less fear childbirth - less traumatic event delivery - le cesareans instrumental delivery - less postpartum depression - less appointment urgency pregnancy - good Mother-child relation 3 month - good self-estimated quality life
